duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide primary care and medical treatment to patients with a focus on family practice and without obstetrics.
Conduct patient assessments, medical diagnoses, and treatment planning while ensuring compassionate and empathetic care delivery.
Apply clinical knowledge and expertise to address a wide range of health concerns, including chronic conditions and preventive care.
Effectively manage time and patient flow while maintaining high-quality care standards.
Utilize strong communication skills to educate patients, discuss treatment options, and coordinate with other healthcare professionals.
Demonstrate problem-solving abilities in addressing complex medical issues and adapting to changing patient needs.

education_certification.credential: Medical degree (MD or DO) from an accredited institution and completion of residency in family medicine.
